Grid

Pedestal includes a mobile-first responsive grid system based on flexbox. By default, the grid is divided up in twelfths. This means there are classes from .row-1 to .row-12, .col-1 to .col-12 and .offset-1 to .offset-12. This amount can be changed by editing the $columns sass variable.

Automatic column resizing

When there is no number assigned to the rows or columns, the columns will automatically resize to fit on a single row.

.row
.col
.row
.col
.col
.col
.row
.col
.col
.col
.col
.col
<div class="row">
  <div class="col">.col</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
</div>

Fixed column width per row

.row-6
.col

.col

<div class="row-6">

  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
</div>
<div class="row-4">
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
</div>
<div class="row-3">
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
</div>

Responsive

Responsive rows

.row-12 .row-sm-6 .row-lg-4
.col
.col
.col
.col
.col
.col
<div class="row-12 row-sm-6 row-lg-4">
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
</div>

Responsive columns

As usual, the classes of the column override the width set in the row. To get the column to resize with the row again .col-auto is used.

.row-12 .row-sm-6 .row-lg-4
.col-auto .col-lg-8
.col
.col
.col
.col
.col
<div class="row-12 row-sm-6 row-lg-4">
  <div class="col-auto col-lg-8">.col-auto .col-lg-8</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
</div>

Offsets

.row
.col
.col.-offset-2
.col
<div class="row">
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col -offset-2">.col.-offset-2</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
</div>

Responsive offsets

.row
.col
.col.-offset-lg-2
.col
.row
.col-12 .col-sm-6 .col-lg-4
.col-6 .-offset-6 .col-sm-6 .-offset-sm-0 .col-lg-2 .-offset-lg-4
.col-12 .col-lg-2
<div class="row">
  <div class="col-12 col-sm-6 col-lg-4">.col-12 .col-sm-6 .col-lg-4</div>
  <div class="col-6 -offset-6 col-sm-6 -offset-sm-0 col-lg-3 -offset-lg-3">.col-6 .-offset-6 .col-sm-6 .-offset-sm-0 .col-lg-2 .-offset-lg-4</div>
  <div class="col-12 col-lg-2">.col-12 .col-lg-2</div>
</div>

Vertical transformation

Default row

.row
.col-4
.col

This column contains way more text than any of the other columns do. Because of that, this column is higher.

.col
.col

This column contains a small amount of text.

<div class="row -vert-align-end">
  <div class="col-4">.col-4</div>
  <div class="col">This column contains way more text than...</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
</div>

Even height

.row .-fullheight
.col-4
.col

This column contains way more text than any of the other columns do. Because of that, this column is higher.

.col
.col

This column contains a small amount of text.

<div class="row -vert-align-end">
  <div class="col-4">.col-4</div>
  <div class="col">This column contains way more text than...</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
</div>

Vertically centered columns

.row .-vert-align-center
.col-4
.col

This column contains way more text than any of the other columns do. Because of that, this column is higher.

.col
.col

This column contains a small amount of text.

<div class="row -vert-align-end">
  <div class="col-4">.col-4</div>
  <div class="col">This column contains way more text than...</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
</div>

Columns aligned to bottom

.row .-vert-align-end
.col-4
.col

This column contains way more text than any of the other columns do. Because of that, this column is higher.

.col
.col

This column contains a small amount of text.

<div class="row -vert-align-end">
  <div class="col-4">.col-4</div>
  <div class="col">This column contains way more text than...</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
</div>

Horizontal transformation

Default row

.row-3
.col
.col
.col
<div class="row-3">
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
</div>

Horizontally centered columns

.row-3 .-hor-align-center
.col
.col
.col
<div class="row-3 -hor-align-center">
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
</div>

Aligned to bottom

.row-3 .-hor-align-end
.col
.col
.col
<div class="row-3 -hor-align-end">
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
</div>

Even space around columns

.row-3 .-hor-align-around
.col
.col
.col
<div class="row-3 -hor-align-around">
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
</div>

Even space between columns

.row-3 .-hor-align-between
.col
.col
.col
<div class="row-3 -hor-align-between">
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
  <div class="col">.col</div>
</div>

Notes when customizing

  1. Don't write classes starting with .col- or .row-. These are reserved for the grid.
